siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Our about page hasn’t been updated since we built the site originally, so we bring up some of the things that have changed since our initial bios. One day we might even get to updating the about page itself. We also briefly touch on resolutions as we try to come up…

Dear Listener, This week Stan wants to discuss how he goes through life - setting and keeping personal and household rules. Listen in to what types of rules he sets, how he uses them, and what they protect him from. Then we talk about the 3rd Episode of Hawkeye and the state of…
